author: Sania Mirza
text: One of the thrills of playing at the top tennis centres of the world is to see the Indian flag go up whenever I'm participating in these events. That's enough motivation for any Indian who has the opportunity to perform at these tournaments.

author: Lleyton Hewitt
text: I'm not a guy who needs to read motivation books.

author: Julian Clary
text: It was all about wanting to get revenge. Pathetic, really, but it still is the motivation.

author: Michael Koryta
text: Hopefully my books are improving. One of the ways I find motivation to improve is looking at someone who is already at a high level and continues to get better with each book. That's really what you want to emulate.

author: Brian Cox
text: For me, it's just acting. It's pretending. The best actors are children, and children don't do research. You never see a child going, 'I'm wondering about my motivation here. How can I do this toy? How can I do this train? I don't feel train.'

author: Lorrie Fair
text: I don't know if there are words to describe my motivation.

author: Gene Luen Yang
text: It's a big deal to reveal your friend's deepest truth, your friend's deepest secret. And for all of us, when we do these big things, there's a complexity of motivation that comes behind that decision.

author: Katarina Johnson-Thompson
text: Obviously, when you're up against somebody you don't like there's extra motivation, but I don't think any person going for an Olympic gold is going to put friendship first.

author: Jim Ryun
text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.

author: Jimmy Haynes
text: The last two years we got beat in this round. They came out with the motivation to win.

author: Katarina Witt
text: Money was never the motivation. It never should be in sports.

author: Matthew McConaughey
text: Vanity is great motivation, to be fair.

author: Steve Howey
text: The least amount of info actors get, the better. Actors are always like, 'What is my motivation for this?' You didn't write it. Just say the lines.

author: Bjorn Borg
text: It's tough when you're No. 1. You don't have any private life, you can't even walk anywhere. I think that was one reason why I lost my motivation to play tennis.

author: James Sinegal
text: I think that most of the people running companies today are motivated and pay is a small portion of the motivation.

author: Bob Nelson
text: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.

author: Vikram Seth
text: My main motivation is not to get bored. I'm just hoping I get a vaguely maverick reputation.

author: Henry Rollins
text: Motivation has always been a fascinating factor when considering a touring artist, especially when the years stack up. What keeps one out there year after year?

author: Valentino Rossi
text: Fortunately during my career I have won more or less everything, so I need to enjoy it to have the right motivation.

author: Suzanne Farrell
text: But what was my motivation was music, and the fact that I love to move around. I'm always moving around.

author: Hermann Maier
text: I sat down with my trainers to check my past seasons and to see what could be done to keep me motivated and in good shape. I had to find a new motivation, a new momentum.

author: Max Martini
text: When suffering from TBI and PTSD, it's difficult to find the motivation to seek help. I want society not to forget those that served this country.

author: Rafael Nadal
text: My motivation is tomorrow, just one day at a time, right?

author: Zendaya
text: Let's practice motivation and love, not discrimination and hate.

author: Zig Ziglar
text: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.

author: Maurice Allais
text: At the beginning of my career, my desire to understand was associated with a profound desire to act, with the wish to influence opinion and policy; but, over the years, this motivation has come to be of secondary importance, far behind my desire to understand.

author: Ellen Ochoa
text: What everyone in the astronaut corps shares in common is not gender or ethnic background, but motivation, perseverance, and desire - the desire to participate in a voyage of discovery.

author: Kevin Plank
text: Motivation, passion, and focus have to come from the top.

author: Jessie Pavelka
text: It's easy to motivate a client when they are sitting on a bench right in front of you, but the real challenge for a trainer is to have that motivation exist even when you are not around.

author: Tim Kaine
text: If faith is your motivation, share that.

author: Greg Ginn
text: If people are really excited about their music, and that's their primary motivation, then that comes through in demo tapes. That's the most important ingredient.

author: LeBron James
text: I do have motivation. A lot of motivation.

author: William J. Clinton
text: In the new economy, information, education, and motivation are everything.

author: Paul S. Kemp
text: I'm a transactional lawyer, which involves a lot of negotiation. If nothing else, that's given me a good eye for human motivation and frequent case studies in peculiar psychological quirks. I think that's served me fairly well as a writer.

author: Donny Osmond
text: I got fitter when I did 'Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat.' I wore a loincloth - that's a lot of motivation!

author: Simon Beaufoy
text: I just can't get excited about money as a motivation in a film. It leaves me cold.

author: Kim Clijsters
text: These were the moments when I was disappointed and frustrated, when I got so low because it seemed all my hard work had been wasted. But the moments passed, and the motivation to go back to rehab was there again.

author: Hans Blix
text: Iraq did not spontaneously opt for disarmament. They did it as part of a ceasefire, so they were forced to do it, otherwise the war might have gone on. So the motivation has been very different.

author: Steve Easterbrook
text: My motivation at the moment is around knowing how it feels to turn a business around, and I can't wait to have that feeling again.

author: Jesse Jackson
text: If you think black people have a motivation problem, open up a Wal-Mart and advertise a thousand jobs. Watch 5,000 people show up.

author: Mary Gordon
text: I believe that if your primary motivation in life is to be moral, you don't become an artist.

author: Marvin Hagler
text: You know looking back on it now I used the fight and after the fight as motivation, to make sure I was going to be the best middleweight in the world for a long time.

author: Dichen Lachman
text: I do paint, and I wanted to actually be a painter. Sometimes I'll whip out paints. It's tough to find the motivation, but it's also a solitary, lonely occupation. What I like about acting is that it is such a collaborative thing.

author: Herman Cain
text: My motivation for running for Senate was not for the stature of being a senator, but because I wanted to make a difference on issues I feel passionate about.

author: Michael Schumacher
text: Once something is a passion, the motivation is there.

author: James Taylor
text: That's the motivation of an artist - to seek attention of some kind.

author: Sidney Sheldon
text: I try to give both my heroes and villains an emotional dimensionality which provides the motivation for their actions.

author: M. Night Shyamalan
text: I love my stories being multi-layered, and coming at it from different angles, so that you don't understand the film's true emotional motivation until the very end.

author: Paul Buchheit
text: Google is about information and computers and making things really fast. Facebook is about the sharing and connections. These missions give these companies direction and motivation.

author: Laila Robins
text: I'd rather do a great play than a mediocre play in New York. As much as I'd like to be seen in New York, that's not my driving motivation. My motivation is to play great roles, wherever they happen.

author: Nicholas Hoult
text: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.

author: Liam McIntyre
text: As a younger actor, my motivation may have been 'Do you want that job or don't you?' Now it's 'Do you want to look like crap on film?'

author: Tim Tebow
text: I'll always use the negativity as more motivation to work even harder and become even stronger.

author: Arsene Wenger
text: For me, motivation is a person who has the capability to recruit the resources he needs to achieve a goal.

author: Orson Scott Card
text: I wonder sometimes if the motivation for writers ought to be contempt, not admiration.

author: Walter Savage Landor
text: We talk on principal, but act on motivation.

author: Holly Madison
text: I could live a normal life. My motivation is only to take on new challenges.

author: Jeff Bezos
text: The thing that motivates me is a very common form of motivation. And that is, with other folks counting on me, it's so easy to be motivated.

author: Liev Schreiber
text: I was always curious about motivation and intention, and really, that's a lot of what acting is.

author: Xavier Dolan
text: The motivation for making movies is that people actually see them.

author: Bo Bennett
text: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.

author: Alexis Arguello
text: I'd say the most memorable thing for me was my dedication and motivation in how I got so involved in boxing.

author: Ann Druyan
text: Well, I actually grew up in the sixties. I feel very lucky, actually, that that was my slice of time that I was dealt. Let's remember that the real motivation in the sixties, and even in the fifties, was the Cold War.

author: Kim Yuna
text: I have been compared to Mao since we were both junior skaters. We've felt the rivalry since then, so we wanted to avoid each other. However, she has been my motivation.

author: Lily Cole
text: Talent is crucial. It needs to be driven by motivation, but blind ambition isn't the key.

author: Michael Moore
text: I mean if politics was my main motivation I would be doing politics. But I'm a filmmaker.

author: Juliana Hatfield
text: Motivation is just this potion to create stuff, a compulsion to express the truth of my own experiences in this life.

author: Gary Neville
text: With good coaching, proper motivation and the right club structure with organic growth, you can achieve an awful lot in football.

author: Edmund Hillary
text: I think it all comes down to motivation. If you really want to do something, you will work hard for it.

author: Michael Phelps
text: I think sometimes I guess you see records, say you want to get there and use that as motivation. In a way, it's kind of cool if there is a possibility to rewrite history and be up there with the greats of Olympic history.

author: Spike Lee
text: All directors are storytellers, so the motivation was to tell the story I wanted to tell. That's what I love.

author: Manfred Mann
text: I grew up in South Africa, but like many people at that time, I couldn't bear living in the country. The main motivation for moving to Britain was to get away.

author: Warren Beatty
text: Being here allows me to make the case that not all aging, narcissistic movie actors whose children could be mistaken for their grandchildren necessarily act with the same motivation.

author: Daniel H. Pink
text: I don't think it's a Western thing to really talk about intrinsic motivation and the drive for autonomy, mastery and purpose. You have to not be struggling for survival. For people who don't know where their next meal is coming, notions of finding inner motivation are comical.

author: Jason Fried
text: Meetings should be like salt - a spice sprinkled carefully to enhance a dish, not poured recklessly over every forkful. Too much salt destroys a dish. Too many meetings destroy morale and motivation.

author: Dorothy Denning
text: While many hackers have the knowledge, skills, and tools to attack computer systems, they generally lack the motivation to cause violence or severe economic or social harm.

author: Dan Ariely
text: While we somehow understand revenge on an intuitive level between individuals, I do suspect that companies, assuming that people are rational, completely miss and underestimate the motivation people have for revenge.

author: Eden Hazard
text: I'm not saying I like to be kicked, but it's good for me to feel I am in the game. Definitely. A motivation.

author: Kawhi Leonard
text: Winning is motivation.

author: Cullen Bunn
text: My hope is that each of the villains I write will have his or her own motivation that readers can understand, whether they agree or disagree.

author: Gael Garcia Bernal
text: Histories are to educate so that we understand better for ourselves and for motivation.

author: Tina Thompson
text: We had an opportunity to clinch a playoff berth and I think if that's not enough motivation I don't think you should be playing this game.

author: Jessica Scorpio
text: Exercise plays a huge role in keeping me sane, and that's my primary motivation to 'find time.'

author: Lindsay Fox
text: I don't think there's any real motivation for somebody to be a truck driver. Mine was simple; dad was a truck driver, I wanted to own one.

author: Vladimir Putin
text: It is extremely dangerous to encourage people to see themselves as exceptional, whatever the motivation.

author: Cory Booker
text: I'm a person that's grounded in faith and believe that my core values, motivation, inspiration, draw from a conception of the world in that way.

author: Panayiotis Zavos
text: My motivation is my desire to help people. If people want to have children and cannot in the normal way, and I can do something about it, then I will do so.

author: Jason Day
text: Just looking when I was little at pictures of cars and houses that I wanted - it gives you a certain motivation, it gives you a goal.

author: John Oates
text: Personally, I've never really wanted to be a rock star. That wasn't my motivation in life. It kind of happened.

author: Michele Bachmann
text: If there was one word on a motivation or world view, that one word would be 'liberty.' That's what inspires me and motivates me more than anything - just the concept of freedom, liberty, what it means.

author: Tom Stoppard
text: Chekhov understood that people are mysterious and can't be reduced to what we nowadays call 'motivation.'

author: Tony Parsons
text: My principal motivation is supporting my family, which is not a bad reason for getting up in the morning. That's always been my motivation - to take care of the people who rely on me.

author: Kevin Nash
text: I'm 53, and it's hard to get to the gym every day. If I know on Friday I'm going to be wrestling, then I don't want to look bad, so it gives me motivation. Plus, once you're in motion, it's a lot easier to stay in motion.

author: Erin Andrews
text: I think what I try to do with all the naysayers, negative comments, or even people that think you can't do it, I'm trying very hard to use it as motivation and to add to that chip on my shoulder.

author: Roger Clemens
text: Everybody kind of perceives me as being angry. It's not anger, it's motivation.

author: Jim Rohn
text: If someone is going down the wrong road, he doesn't need motivation to speed him up. What he needs is education to turn him around.

author: Ben Zobrist
text: Knowing the opportunity to win a championship here in Chicago, right now, that's the main motivation for me.

author: Dorothy Denning
text: If we take as given that critical infrastructures are vulnerable to a cyber terrorist attack, then the question becomes whether there are actors with the capability and motivation to carry out such an operation.

author: Tommy Caldwell
text: I have always let my motivation guide me, and that has served me well. Climbing has taught me how to thrive and created a life that I feel incredibly lucky to have.

author: Sheryl Swoopes
text: It didn't matter how good I was. It was always, 'You're a girl. You can't play with the guys.' It's always been motivation for me.

author: Liev Schreiber
text: I was always curious about motivation and intention, and really, that's a lot of what acting is. I was a little bit different.

author: Kawhi Leonard
text: I could have gone to a bigger school. I use it as motivation going to a school that loved me. I wanted to put them on the map and show everyone that you don't need to go to a top school to make it in the NBA.

author: Liam Smith
text: I don't need any more motivation. I'm fighting Canelo Alvarez. If that can't get me motivated, then I'm in the wrong sport.

author: Asdrubal Cabrera
text: I thank those people that thought I had lost the agility to play shortstop, because they gave me more motivation.

author: Donald Norman
text: We expert teachers know that motivation and emotional impact are what matter.

author: Mark Rylance
text: But I find with Francis Bacon, some of the things were in the place, and someone who was connected with these schools of thought, and someone who had a motivation that equals the scope of the comedy and the tragedy in the plays.

author: Jerry Reed
text: When people ask me what my motivation is, I have a simple answer: money.

author: Tink
text: Working with Timbaland, he gives me insight; he throws me different ways to approach the beat, and those extra tips go a long way. I know that he's worked with some of the greats, so it's just motivation. I feel inspired when we're in the booth together.

author: Azim Premji
text: Excellence endures and sustains. It goes beyond motivation into the realms of inspiration.

author: Anne Parillaud
text: I had never even thought I'd be an actress - I was supposed to be a lawyer. But the motivation is the same: when you act, you defend a role; you have to be convincing. It's the same career.

author: John Badham
text: The personality problem is so tough when you're not able to pay people. It's bad enough when you can pay people, but, when you have people working for free, often their motivation is diminished considerably.

author: Andy Murray
text: I used to think that losing made you more hungry and determined but after my success at the Olympics and the U.S. Open I realise that winning is the biggest motivation.

author: Kimi Raikkonen
text: There's always a lot of talk about motivation to race, but nobody really knows what I do or what I think apart from myself, so I don't really care what people think.

author: John Ortberg
text: When people feel they're getting to speak into what's being preached, there is high built-in motivation to participate.

author: Jane Smiley
text: In my experience, there is only one motivation, and that is desire. No reasons or principle contain it or stand against it.

author: Desi Arnaz
text: A single prop that does not look real to an audience can louse you up. The same is true of the smallest flaw in setting up the motivation in a story line.

author: Norman Ralph Augustine
text: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.

author: Monica Seles
text: It doesn't matter who is playing or how old they are. I just worry about what I can control. It doesn't give me more or less motivation.

author: Tom Riley
text: I love to run. When the weather's bad, I should get on the treadmill in the basement gym of my apartment building, but I lack the motivation.

author: Seth Shostak
text: While I have always thought that the motivation for looking for E.T. was both self-evident and patently worthy, it's possible that I'm a victim of my own job description. Others don't inevitably agree. Some will opine that there are better ways to spend the money.

author: Oscar Isaac
text: The motivation is important for me to act it, but I don't necessarily want the audience to know my motivation.

author: Russell Banks
text: One of the things I have tried to do with this book and with all of them really is avoid that simple, easy, reductionist view of motivation and to show we do things for a complex net of reasons, a real braid of reasons.

author: Sheri L. Dew
text: My progress on the piano and my motivation to practice increased dramatically when I caught a vision of my potential.

author: Grimes
text: I'm actually not a particularly negative person, but I feel like most things are better when they're not actualized. The motivation that comes from wanting something is so much more driving of people than actually getting it.

author: Tracy Morgan
text: Ladies are honest. They're my motivation. They know what's funny, and the dudes just follow.

author: Richard Simmons
text: I used to think that if someone gained their weight back, it was my fault, but all I can do is be God's motivator and try to instill the motivation in others so they do it themselves.

author: Michael Palin
text: I do have high standards. I look at everything I have done and think, 'Why wasn't that better?' Part of my motivation is from crippling self-doubt - I have got to prove myself wrong.

author: Ang Lee
text: Emotions serve characters' purposes. That is their motivation.

author: Barry Sanders
text: In all the time that people have known me, has anyone ever heard me talk about the importance of rushing records or finishing with the most touchdowns? So if that's never been important to me, then why would that be a motivation to keep playing?

author: Dennis Brown
text: But now I'm getting that spiritual motivation to visit Africa.

author: Marilyn vos Savant
text: I think change is possible, but only for individuals who were never truly gay in the first place and who have a strong personal motivation to recover their heterosexuality.

author: Lou Holtz
text: Motivation is simple. You eliminate those who are not motivated.

author: Asdrubal Cabrera
text: That's everyone's motivation: to get to the playoffs and win the World Series.

author: Arsene Wenger
text: When you look at people who are successful, you will find that they aren't the people who are motivated, but have consistency in their motivation.

author: Donald Trump
text: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.

author: Lee Iacocca
text: Motivation is everything. You can do the work of two people, but you can't be two people. Instead, you have to inspire the next guy down the line and get him to inspire his people.

author: Wayne Dyer
text: Deficiency motivation doesn't work. It will lead to a life-long pursuit of try to fix me. Learn to appreciate what you have and where and who you are.

author: Michelle Yeoh
text: Some of the martial arts films, the motivation is about martial arts. That's where it's coming from. It is a visual, commercial film, to showcase the next stunt, the biggest thing. And character development becomes a side thing.

author: Joanne Liu
text: Nations don't have friends; they have interests. The best motivation for a state to act if it is remote from an epidemic is if its own security is at risk.

author: Alfred Hitchcock
text: When an actor comes to me and wants to discuss his character, I say, 'It's in the script.' If he says, 'But what's my motivation?, ' I say, 'Your salary.'

author: Michael Shermer
text: Myths are stories that express meaning, morality or motivation. Whether they are true or not is irrelevant.

author: Keke Palmer
text: Anytime you see Beyonce, Jay Z, Kanye West. Anytime a young black person's doing good, that's motivation for everybody else. Anytime, anytime, it's motivation. Use that fuel to push you forward. That's what I did.

author: Maurice Allais
text: My motivation was an idea of being able to improve the conditions of life, to try to find a remedy to many of the problems facing the world. That's what led me into economics. I saw it as a way of helping people.

author: Young Thug
text: I don't ever want to be like a peasant. I want to always be all right. But motivation is fans - not your kids, your mum, none of that. All of that matters, but number one is your fans.

author: Tink
text: I'll be honest with you: before I heard Nicki rapping, I probably wouldn't have thought to rap myself. Just to see a female doing it and being in there with the guys, it was motivation.

author: Buzz Aldrin
text: NASA's been one of the most successful public investments in motivating students to do well and achieve all they can achieve, and it's sad that we are turning the program in a direction where it will reduce the amount of motivation it provides to young people.

author: Daniel Radcliffe
text: As far as I can tell, most actors' main motivation is self-doubt and neuroses.

author: Chuck Klosterman
text: The biggest problem in rock journalism is that often the writer's main motivation is to become friends with the band. They're not really journalists; they're people who want to be involved in rock and roll.

author: Marit Bjorgen
text: If the motivation is gone, then I am finished.

author: Jim Carrey
text: People need motivation to do anything. I don't think human beings learn anything without desperation.

author: Adam Yauch
text: When I hear Obama speak he just seems really sincere and he just seems like somebody who actually has his heart and his motivation in the right place. Forget about color or race or gender or whatever, he's got his heart in the right place.

author: Jane McGonigal
text: If you make it a game, gamers will play it no matter what your motivation is in making it.

author: Ryan Sheckler
text: Every time somebody calls me out or tries to start something, it's motivation.

author: Ma Jun
text: The motivation should come from regulatory enforcement, but enforcement is weak, and environmental litigation is near to impossible. So there's an urgent need for extensive public participation to generate another kind of motivation.

author: Jillian Michaels
text: You can look for external sources of motivation and that can catalyze a change, but it won't sustain one. It has to be from an internal desire.

author: Don Cornelius
text: One motivation for the 'Soul Train' awards was the grumbling that all of us in the industry have heard about the way black music tends to be viewed as a secondary phenomenon by the other awards shows.

author: Becky G
text: In my industry, it's important to have people I look to for different things: guidance, inspiration and motivation.

author: Clayton Christensen
text: Understanding motivation is one of the most important things we can do in our lives, because it has such a bearing on why we do the things we do and whether we enjoy them or not.

author: Daniel Boulud
text: I can't conceive of cooking in a sunny place like Florida because my motivation comes from the changing seasons. That's why I decided to live in New York.

author: Teri Garr
text: I have worked enough and I am happy to be touring the country speaking about living with MS to give people inspiration and motivation to help themselves.

author: Lou Holtz
text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

author: Holt McCallany
text: I would say that one of the really special gifts about playing an athlete is that it's the best motivation you'll ever have to get in top shape and stay in top shape because you know that you're going to be expected to deliver.

author: Sean Parker
text: I definitely wanted to earn my freedom. But the primary motivation wasn't making money, but making an impact.

author: Rick Scott
text: Obstacles to job creation in America are a result of policy, not of motivation.

author: Markus Wolf
text: I tried to instill a different motivation, to give them the security and the conviction that they were doing something good, something necessary, something useful - if you want to use a grandiose expression, that they were doing something for peace.

author: Eliot Spitzer
text: I don't care about motivation. I care about credibility.

author: Noel Coward
text: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday.

author: Michael Jordan
text: When I lose the sense of motivation and the sense to prove something as a basketball player, it's time for me to move away from the game.

author: Damon Galgut
text: Real obsession needs an unconscious motivation behind it.

author: Wendelin Van Draanen
text: Part of my motivation for writing mysteries for young people is that I loved mysteries when I was growing up, and now that I'm on the creative end of things, I'm discovering that they're even more fun to write!

author: Jonathan Ive
text: When we started work on the iPhone, the motivation there was we all pretty much couldn't stand our phones, and we wanted a better phone.

author: Jason Dufner
text: There's always motivation coming into Majors. If you can't get up and get excited to win one of these, then you probably shouldn't be playing golf.

author: Valentino Rossi
text: The great fights with your strongest rivals are always the biggest motivation. When you win easily it's not the same taste.

author: Taylor Lautner
text: In my last scene in 'Breaking Dawn,' Bella has just died and I run outside and crumple to the ground and just lose it. I'm bawling. That was my last scene of 'Twilight' ever and I definitely had some extra motivation.

author: J. K. Simmons
text: I do think you need to understand a character's motivation and perspective.

author: Andy Weir
text: You want an audience. If you didn't, you wouldn't be a writer. The biggest motivation to write is the knowledge that someone will read it.

author: Paul Twitchell
text: Y'know, the real reason why I was such a failure in the sense of being unable to make any sort of a living was because I was really not motivated. I had no motivation.

author: Carson Wentz
text: I'm a very motivated person. I don't need extra motivation.

author: Eminem
text: If people take anything from my music, it should be motivation to know that anything is possible as long as you keep working at it and don't back down.

author: Jerome Hines
text: The motivation part is all essential in keeping my voice, but there are the human factors of discipline.

author: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce
text: When you have good runners, you always run fast. That's the motivation for me. But I have room to improve in my technique and in the start.

author: Tom Wolfe
text: There is no motivation higher than being a good writer.

author: Nora Roberts
text: Action, reaction, motivation, emotion, all have to come from the characters. Writing a love scene requires the same elements from the writer as any other.

author: Jurgen Klopp
text: If you are full of motivation as a player, if you are full of concentration, I am open arms.

author: Bryan Clay
text: For so long I wanted to win the gold medal. Then I won. I had to figure out what was the new motivation to take myself to that place again.

author: Nicola Sturgeon
text: Thatcher was the motivation for my entire political career. I hated everything she stood for.

author: Kawhi Leonard
text: My motivation wasn't really to get a $95 million contract, you know?

author: Laura Schlessinger
text: Psychology doesn't like to talk about evil. It likes to talk about bad childhoods. But I very much believe that some people are evil and motivation is not necessary for evil.

author: Alec Berg
text: I have enough motivation just not looking like an idiot on national television. The fear of disappointing people is certainly higher.
